channel.description: Recent content in Causality on Wenbo Lv

item.title: Empirical Dynamic Modeling (EDM)
item.description: Detecting Causality in Complex Ecosystems (CCM) Causal inference from cross-sectional earth system data with geographical convergent cross mapping (GCCM) Partial cross mapping eliminates indirect causal influences (PCM) Spatial convergent cross mapping to detect causal relationships from short time series (MultispatialCCM) Detecting Causality from Nonlinear Dynamics with Short-term Time Series (CMS) Detecting dynamical causality by intersection cardinal concavity (CMC) Single-cell causal network inferred by cross-mapping entropy (CME)

item.title: R books
item.description: R fundamentals Introduction to R Advanced R R for Data Science (2e) R Graphics Cookbook, 2nd edition The tidyverse style guide R in Production What They Forgot to Teach You About R Data Visualization with ggplot2 Efficient R programming Best Coding Practices for R Happy Git and GitHub for the useR Rcpp for everyone Rcpp for everyone Chinese version Unofficial rcpp api documentation R Packages (2e) R Markdown Chinese guide

item.title: Spatial Causal Inference
item.description: Causal inference in spatial statistics Spatial Causality: A Systematic Review on Spatial Causal Inference A review of causal analysis methods in geographic research Conduct Multiple Types of Geographic Regression Discontinuity Designs(SpatialRDD) Spatial Difference-in-differences (SpatialDID) Evidence on the impact of sustained exposure to air pollution on life expectancy from China’s Huai River policy Rethinking ‘causality’ in quantitative human geography Inferring causation from time series in Earth system sciences Causal inference for time series

item.title: Spatial Association
item.description: Spatial Association from the Perspective of Mutual Information Spatial association between regionalizations using the information-theoretical V-measure
